Work Experience

 Aug, 2006 - Present

Hill + Knowlton Strategies

Interactive Art Director/Front End Developer

At H+K Strategies I fill many roles: designer, developer, strategist, social media expert, etc. Mainly, my role is that of a front end developer for both websites and web applications. I work closely with the design team and client teams to engineer wireframes and mockups into rich, interactive web environments. I pay special attention to ensuring a seamless, consistent, responsive omni-channel user experience. Additionally, I strive for maximum self-sufficience in regards to client publishing.

Some of my responsibilities include:

  • Providing user-experience, promotional and strategic counsel to existing and potential clients.
  • Providing art direction to junior designers.
  • Managing budgets for client projects.
  • Assisting in concepting and development of new business opportunities.

My projects include:

  • Designed and/or Art Directed many corporate and marketing websites for companies ranging from small businesses to Fortune 500s. Extensively developed custom themes, plugins and components for Wordpress CMS sites.
  • Designed and developed (front end) Flight School, a proprietary SAAS product to assist with simulating crises on social media. Worked with Rails developer to integrate responsive BatmanJS-based front end.
  • Designed and developed (front end) Storyplanner, a proprietary SAAS product to assist clients and client teams in planning campaigns and programs using a "layered narrative" paradigm. Worked with Rails developer to integrate an AngularJS-based front end.
  • For the Tourism Authority of Thailand I developed three separate sites (two Wordpress and one jQuery-based), planned strategic promotional activities, managed the social media team and managed a quarter of a million dollar budget.
